short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See recent activities of a github repository

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an "Activities" tab to the GitHub repository page and shows you recent activities of the repository.

Recent activities such as issues/PRs opened,  comments on the issues/PRs, and commits to the repository, are listed chronologically. Giving you a quick overview of what's happening in a GitHub repository.

There is also a web version of the extension. Visit https://repo.events to see recent activities of any public repositories without the need to install the extension. As a shortcut, enter repo.events/{owner}/{repo} to your browser address bar to see activities from the repository immediately. For example https://repo.events/golang/go or https://repo.events/apple/swift .

This extension (and the website) is open source! If this extension is useful to you, consider give it a star at https://github.com/buzap/repo.events
